name: Dominions at War
description:
Dominions at War is a open world 2D medieval sandbox. You're not the hero, you're merely another individual within this vast medieval world. You start your journey as a peasant and can advance all the way to a King commanding your own Kingdom. The steps to reach this is up to you! Do you have what it takes to live in this harsh medieval world? 

  • Party/Kingdom Management - Recruit soldiers to join your Army and use them to crush your enemies! Raise a Kingdom and recruit patrols or even lords to fight with you!
  • Ranking System - Start as a peasant and earn honor to advance through 7 different ranks to earn the title of King!
  • Lively World - Watch the world of Arieweth come to life! With constant events happening around you. Perhaps looters are attacking a party of farmers, or two lords are clashing to the death. The world never sleeps!
  • Dynamic Day/Night - Time is a thing in this sandbox, fight during the day or during the night! 
  • Dynamic Weather - It will rain or even snow within this medieval world.
  • Achievements - Earn achievements and unlock new characters/rewards!
  • Epic Battles - Fight in huge open battles or sieges against AI opponents!
  • Shopping - Earn gold to purchase new weapons, armor, or supplies for your army.
  • Trading - Salvage items after battle to sell at traders! Or be a merchant and find the best prices around!
  • Hunger - Keep your army fed or else they will desert!
  • Skill Tree - Earn upgrade points to better level up your armies skill tree!
  • Troop Tree - Upgrade your recruits all the way up to advance infantry or elite archers! You choose their paths!
  • Dynamic Dialogue - Notice the disrespect or respect you get with your current rank! 
  • Points of Interest - Attack bandit hideouts and earn rewards!
  • Random Events - Experience random events that happen throughout time!

  • New Lands - Travel by ship to new areas to further conquer!
  • Quests - Help out individuals in need for rewards!
  • More Units - Will add more units for troop tree.
  • Kingdom Color - Will be able to pick your Kingdoms color.
  • Settings - Will add more options within the settings menu.
  • Achievements Page - Will add an actual achievement page so you can see what you have to unlock and work towards.

Dominions at War is solely developed by myself Imperious Productions. Development may be quick at some points but may slow at other points. It just depends on my current circumstances in life. However this project will continue and just get better with time. If you catch bugs or glitches please let me know! If you have gameplay requests to add also please let me know! I appreciate your early support and your interest in my game. Please join my development discord at https://discord.gg/FECsVz8uUP thanks!.
